title: Subtitlers POW WOW!
abstract: Calling all amateur translators of fiction films, documentaries, talks and citizen video-journalist clips. Come by and share your experiences. Perhaps we still have time to organise a little Aegisub workshop for absolute beginners.
description: A POW WOW is a meeting of Indian chiefs to discuss politics in broken English as per the extremely awful Hollywood Westerns of the 1950s and 60s. Any resemblance with how pre-colonial peoples actually spoke at any point in time is purely coincidental.
